briefdescription.para: Initializes the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor It initializes the sensor structure and sets the I2C communication protocol.

detaileddescription.para: std includes Common to all sensors Common to the same generation of senors Sensor specific includes

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor structure

briefdescription.para: De-Initializes the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor It frees the corresponding pointers of the sensor structure and sets the pointers to NULL.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor structure

briefdescription.para: Updates the required registers to read the temperature value of the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor It updates the required registers and then calls the getTemperature() function of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor structure
Retrieved temperature value of the sensor

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the temperature value of the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor It reads out the required registers to calculate the temperature value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor structure
Retrieved temperature value of the sensor

briefdescription.para: Updates the required registers to read the magnetic field values of the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor It updates the required registers and then calls the calculateFieldValues() function of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor structure
Retrieved magnetic value of the X-Axis
Retrieved magnetic value of the Y-Axis
Retrieved magnetic value of the Z-Axis

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the magnetic field values of the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor It reads out the required registers to calculate the magnetic field value for the X, Y, Z-Axis.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor structure
Retrieved magnetic value of the X-Axis
Retrieved magnetic value of the Y-Axis
Retrieved magnetic value of the Z-Axis

briefdescription.para: Sets the default configuration for the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor It sets the sensor into 1-Byte-Mode and also enables the temperature measurement.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor structure

briefdescription.para: Enables the interrupt after measurement completion of the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor structure

briefdescription.para: Disables the interrupt after measurement completion of the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor structure

briefdescription.para: Sets the update rate for the measurements of the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor structure
Value which is set to the PRD-Bitfield

briefdescription.para: Checks if the wake up functionality is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the XENSIV™ TLx493D-W2BW magnetic 3D sensor structure

simplesect.para: true - If wake up is enabled
false - If wake up is disabled

memberdef.argsstring: (TLx493D_t *sensor, int16_t xlTh, int16_t xhTh, int16_t ylTh, int16_t yhTh, int16_t zlTh, int16_t zhTh)
memberdef.name: TLx493D_W2BW_setWakeUpThresholdsAsInteger

memberdef.argsstring: (TLx493D_t *sensor, double temperature, double xLow, double xHigh, double yLow, double yHigh, double zLow, double zHigh)
memberdef.name: TLx493D_W2BW_setWakeUpThresholds

memberdef.argsstring: (const TLx493D_t *sensor, int16_t rawTemp, TLx493D_SensitivityType_t sens, double xInmT, double yInmT, double zInmT, int16_t *x, int16_t *y, int16_t *z)
memberdef.name: TLx493D_W2BW_calculateRawMagneticFieldAtTemperature
